casebody.data:
No. 13.

Original.

Ex parte: In the Matter of the Montana Mining Company, Limited, Petitioner. Argued November 6 and 7, 1906. Decided January 14, 1907. Mr. Charles J. Hughes, Jr., Mr. W. E. Cullen, Mr. Aléis B. Browne and Mr. Alexander Britton for petitioner. Mr. Arthur Brown, Mr. J. H. Ralston, Mr. M. S. Gunn, Mr. F. L. Siddons and Mr. T. C. Bach for respondent.

Petition for a writ of mandamus.

Stricken from the docket.
